index.backupYourSolutionsToGithub:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the GitHub backup section
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (main heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Backup your Solutions to GitHub"
index.automatedBackupDescription:
**Functional Purpose**: Description of the automated backup feature
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (paragraph below heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Automatically backup your solutions to GitHub with our automated backup tool."
index.safeBackup:
**Functional Purpose**: Feature highlight label for safe backup
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (feature badge)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Safe Backup"
index.greenSquares:
**Functional Purpose**: Feature highlight label for contributing to GitHub green squares
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (feature badge)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Green Squares"
index.itsFree:
**Functional Purpose**: Feature highlight label emphasizing the service is free
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (feature badge)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Its Free!"
index.createGithubRepository:
**Functional Purpose**: Step 1 instruction for setting up GitHub backup
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (instruction list item)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Create a new GitHub repository for your solutions (or reuse an existing one if you were backing up manually)"
index.clickButtonToConnect:
**Functional Purpose**: Step 2 instruction for setting up GitHub backup
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (instruction list item)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Click the button below to connect your GitHub account."
index.backupEverythingOption:
**Functional Purpose**: Step 3 instruction for setting up GitHub backup
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (instruction list item)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Use the \"Backup Everything\" option to backup all your existing solutions."
index.futureSolutionsAutoBackup:
**Functional Purpose**: Step 4 instruction/information for setting up GitHub backup
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (instruction list item)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Future solutions will be automatically backed up as you complete exercises."
index.setupBackup:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to initiate the GitHub backup setup process
**UI Location**: Settings → GitHub Syncer → Connect to GitHub section (action button)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the GitHub Syncer settings and ready to connect
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Setup Backup"
